channel.title: CVE Feed for abdolence -- slack-morphism-rust
channel.description: The latest CVEs for abdolence -- slack-morphism-rust

item.title: CVE-2022-31162|2024-08-03T07:11:39.603Z -- abdolence -- slack-morphism-rust
item.description: Slack Morphism is an async client library for Rust. Prior to 0.41.0, it was possible for Slack OAuth client information to leak in application debug logs. Stricter and more secure debug formatting was introduced in v0.41.0 for OAuth secret types to reduce the possibility of printing sensitive information in application logs. As a workaround, do not print/output requests and responses for OAuth and client configurations in logs.

item.title: CVE-2022-39292|2024-08-03T12:00:44.027Z -- abdolence -- slack-morphism-rust
item.description: Slack Morphism is a modern client library for Slack Web/Events API/Socket Mode and Block Kit. Debug logs expose sensitive URLs for Slack webhooks that contain private information. The problem is fixed in version 1.3.2 which redacts sensitive URLs for webhooks. As a workaround, people who use Slack webhooks may disable or filter debug logs.
